f86f7525-afe2-42c6-8e1e-daf8d1ace1bf.description: Credentialed Section Business Strategy members will be able to understand the strategies that drive enterprise value at today's most valuable firms, adapt the winning strategies to their own businesses, identify new opportunities to create growth, and make actionable strategic recommendations for capital allocation. They have demonstrated the ability to think critically, strategically, and actionably in the digital age.
f86f7525-afe2-42c6-8e1e-daf8d1ace1bf.name: Business Strategy

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Business Strategy Sprint final project: running a company through the Section4 proprietary T-Algorithm and identifying strategic recommendations to increase enterprise value.
Completed all course material in the Section Business Strategy Sprint, including video lessons, case studies, and live classes.
Completed an assessment of a company through the lens of the T-Algorithm.

f5b9db50-a1d4-42a6-b177-92dc33e16615.description: Credentialed Section Brand Strategy members will be able to understand the frameworks, concepts, and models of brand strategy that drive value. They will be fluent in the language of brand strategy, demonstrating a deep comprehension of brand identity, architecture, and strategy, and leverage this understanding for growth. Brand Strategists will be able to communicate brand value consistently and proactively to improve their firm's value proposition and competitive differentiation.
f5b9db50-a1d4-42a6-b177-92dc33e16615.name: Brand Strategy

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Brand Strategy final project: conducting a brand audit and building a brand identity model to be applied across the customer journey; give and receive peer feedback.
Completed all course material in the Section Brand Strategy, including video lessons, case studies, and live classes.
Completed a brand audit of a company.

7213e2be-b35f-4441-9014-ba2349ff9ab2.description: Individuals certified in Product Principles will be able to understand the principles and practices behind today's most successful products. They will be fluent in the language of user-centered product development, targeting, and marketing. A Certified Product Principles member will be able to confidently identify and target consumers, and savvily navigate ongoing product strategy.
7213e2be-b35f-4441-9014-ba2349ff9ab2.name: Product Principles

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Product Principles Sprint final project: identify a core product, identify and target a customer niche, identify levels of competition, and prepare to innovate based on customer needs.
Completed all course material in the Section Product Principles Sprint, including video lessons, case studies, and live classes.
Completed an audit of core product and product competition.

164cfc84-a1b5-441f-93e3-1a293e89a251.description: Credentialed Storytelling for Influence members understand how the human mind is naturally hardwired for story, and can leverage this knowledge in order to effectively communicate with their audience. They create compelling characters, analyze their audience’s motivations, and craft a compelling three-act structure to influence their audience’s beliefs or behaviors. This allows them to effectively sell ideas, pitch themselves or their organization, or market products and services.
164cfc84-a1b5-441f-93e3-1a293e89a251.name: Storytelling for Influence

badge_template_activities.title: Watch all course material, including video lessons and case studies
Draft story map that includes all critical storytelling components
Transform story map into full narrative, whether in written, verbal, or digital form

d9b7f5e8-c15d-4534-8209-2be86cca989a.description: Credentialed Section Platform Strategists will be able to identify opportunities to create, compete with, become more like, and disrupt platform markets. They will be fluent in the language of designing, launching, monetizing, and competing in a platform economy.
d9b7f5e8-c15d-4534-8209-2be86cca989a.name: Platform Strategy

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Platform Strategy Sprint project: evaluate any company for strategic opportunities to evolve into a platform-based business or strengthen its market position.
Completed all course material in the Section Platform Strategy Sprint, including video lessons, case studies, and live classes.
Completed an assessment of a company using the Platform Evolution Framework and identified strategic recommendations.

bc222e4f-a116-4a73-a863-cc26f40a66c6.description: Credentialed Section Complete Manager: Recipient will be able to apply the Complete Manager equation to specific workplace relationships to nurture teammate performance. In one-on-one settings, they are able to cultivate trusting, resilient relationships, facilitate worthy goal-setting, and exhibit coach-like curiosity.
bc222e4f-a116-4a73-a863-cc26f40a66c6.name: Complete Manager

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Complete Manager Sprint project: built out either a personal Operating Manual, a Worthy Goal, or a Coaching Conversation.
Completed all course materials in the Section Complete Manager, including lessons and case studies.

e9654541-afe8-454d-853a-451cf59fb1b0.description: Credentialed Section Positioning: Recipient will be able to apply a systematic, repeatable process to position a product. They are able to translate product features into differentiated value, identify best-fit customers, and select the right market category for a product.
e9654541-afe8-454d-853a-451cf59fb1b0.name: Positioning

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Positioning Sprint project: Presented the differentiated value of a product, including the mapped features and capabilities. Then created a proposal that articulates a plan for validating the value with the help of internal resources and external tests.
Completed all course material in the Section Positioning Sprint, including lessons, case studies, and live classes.

af05c74a-2220-4468-8445-ab43c1c99e39.description: Credentialed Section Customer-Centered Innovation Strategists will be able to discover hidden growth opportunities for a business and develop a novel way to think about framing and solving customer problems. They will be fluent in practicing divergent and convergent thinking, and be able to prioritize and de-risk new business ideas.
af05c74a-2220-4468-8445-ab43c1c99e39.name: Customer-Centered Innovation

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Customer-Centered Innovation Sprint project: Create a proposal that articulates the key recommendations for a business based on the Web of Abstraction and designing an experiment.
Completed all course material in the Section Customer-Centered Innovation Sprint, including video lessons and case studies.
Completed an assessment of a customer using the Innovation Cycle and identified strategic recommendations.

c549305b-1279-4e7b-a4de-bd0dee3443c9.description: Credentialed Section Productivity & Performance Specialists are able to implement science-backed practices to optimize their energy and focus and maintain peak performance at a consistent pace over time. They are able to set big goals and break those goals into achievable tasks. They align their daily routines with the big goals that matter most to their work and lives. They can also build well-designed habits to set up a sustainable system of execution.
c549305b-1279-4e7b-a4de-bd0dee3443c9.name: Productivity & Performance

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Productivity & Performance Sprint project: Designed a personal action plan including OKRs and well-designed daily habits that align with a deeper purpose for work and life.
Completed all course material in the Section Productivity & Performance Sprint including lessons and case studies.

2589bcc5-8ff1-4be1-be7a-3bcc38b2775a.description: Credentialed Section Data Principles strategists understand the language, frameworks, and power of analytics across an organization. They are able to visualize the end-to-end process of running analytics including how to identify opportunities suited for analytics and the data to fuel an investigation. Data Principles strategists will be able to mobilize a team to execute an analysis, anticipate barriers to success, and turn data into a story that generates stakeholder buy-in.
2589bcc5-8ff1-4be1-be7a-3bcc38b2775a.name: Data Principles

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Data Principles Sprint project: Design an analytics model that unlocks insights on a business problem or opportunity, and create a plan for implementation.
Completed all course material in the Section Data Principles Sprint, including lessons, case studies, and live classes.
Completed an analytics model for a company and articulated the need to investigate the business problem or opportunity through strategic recommendations.

37069879-a2a4-41d1-bab7-06fb9838ba81.description: Credentialed Section Viral Growth strategists will understand the key strategies that drive word-of-mouth marketing. They will be able to effectively combine and apply these strategies to make any product, service, brand, or idea “catch on” and experience viral growth. Viral Growth strategists will also be able to apply these strategies internally to make improvements to organizational structure.
37069879-a2a4-41d1-bab7-06fb9838ba81.name: Viral Growth

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Viral Growth Sprint project: Create a proposal that articulates the key recommendations for a company based on company analysis, prioritize the strategies in the STEPPS framework, and create a plan for implementation.
Completed all course material in the Section Viral Growth Sprint, including lessons, case studies, and live classes.
Completed an assessment of a company using the STEPPS framework and identified strategic recommendations.

556a1a81-268f-4b38-b079-8aabd3b938ee.description: Credentialed Section Product Engagement strategists understand the psychology behind the design techniques that form customer habits. Sprinters are able to identify behaviors with habit-forming potential, design customer journeys that drive repeat engagement, measure a project’s impact on habituation, and consider the ethical and strategic implications of their designs.
556a1a81-268f-4b38-b079-8aabd3b938ee.name: Product Engagement

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Product Engagement Sprint project: design and measure a habit-forming customer experience.
Completed all course material in the Section Product Engagement Sprint, including lessons, case studies, and live classes.
Assessed a company’s product and identified opportunities to create or refine product strategy.

96337b3f-780f-42a1-9f72-9cc80c45bf11.description: Individuals who completed the Problem Solving workshop will have the knowledge and tools required to break down a complex problem in a logical, evidence-driven manner, and extract recommendations and next steps.
96337b3f-780f-42a1-9f72-9cc80c45bf11.name: Problem Solving

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 2.5-hour workshop led by Jennie Tung, Partner at Bain & Company
Learned the Pyramid Structure framework and applied it in a small-group case study
Completed the Section Problem-Solving Workshop project

dcef8aa3-7ea8-4a04-871e-eb2790d28c03.description: Credentialed Section Product Experimentation strategists understand the language, frameworks, and power of de-risking products across an organization. They are able to visualize the end-to-end process of de-risking a product, including how to run rigorous experiments that test key product risks. Product Experimentation strategists will be able to mobilize a team to execute the de-risking process, quantify risks, and run experiments that test key risks and earn stakeholder buy-in.
dcef8aa3-7ea8-4a04-871e-eb2790d28c03.name: Product Experimentation

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Product Experimentation Sprint project: Decompose and quantify risks to uncover insights into a product problem or opportunity, and design rigorous experiments to test key risks.
Completed all course material in the Section Product Experimentation Sprint, including lessons and case studies.
Completed the de-risking process for a product and articulated the roadmap to addressing the business problem or opportunity through strategic recommendations.

4500f20d-5e44-465c-a877-887ca0ff9e5a.description: Those receiving the Marketing Principles badge will be able to understand the strategies that drive marketing for growth in today’s economy and how to implement these strategies at their own firm. They can assess companies across various stages of growth, identify new opportunities for expansion, and make actionable strategic recommendations that drive the firm’s brand purpose, strategic whitespace, and marketing roadmap.
4500f20d-5e44-465c-a877-887ca0ff9e5a.name: Marketing Principles

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Marketing Principles Sprint project: Completed an assessment of a company based on the stages of growth and created a marketing roadmap that articulates key initiatives and strategic priorities to unlock your firm’s next stage of growth. As well as, completed all course material in the Section Marketing Principles Sprint, including video lessons and case studies.
Completed all course material in the Section Marketing Principles Sprint, including video lessons, case studies, and live classes.

f78d7ee3-534f-4673-9e39-8adb550a8e2c.description: Credentialed Section Product Strategists are able to create a product strategy that delights customers and drives business performance. They are able to build measurable, testable product hypotheses. They integrate proxy metrics to get quick signals on their experiments. They can build clear roadmaps to communicate and track the success and outcome of their product strategy.
f78d7ee3-534f-4673-9e39-8adb550a8e2c.name: Product Strategy

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Section Product Strategy Sprint project: Build a Product Strategy using the four frameworks for your company or product swimlane
Completed all course material in the Section Product Strategy Sprint including lessons and case studies.

3bf7216a-f073-4d88-b9e0-a31e98bf182e.description: Individuals who completed the Data Storytelling workshop have the ability to convert a heap of data into a compelling and actionable narrative. They can use these skills to monitor strategic goals, give status updates on critical initiatives, and report results after these initiatives are complete. In addition, individuals with this badge gained exposure to a variety of visualization tools that help bring their data stories to life.
3bf7216a-f073-4d88-b9e0-a31e98bf182e.name: Data Storytelling

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 3.5-hour workshop
Learned the three-step framework for crafting a data-driven story and applied it in a small-group case study
Completed the Section Data Storytelling Workshop project

494bea17-f03b-4cd2-b97a-8be7e3e108cc.description: Individuals who complete Financial Fluency have the skills to connect their work to their organization’s financials. They are able to analyze an organization’s financial statements, including balance sheets, cash flow statements, and income statements, to understand the state of the business.
494bea17-f03b-4cd2-b97a-8be7e3e108cc.name: Financial Fluency

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Financial Fluency project and completed all course materials in the Section Financial Fluency course.

3ad75153-8891-4cdf-ac9e-536fd7cc5364.description: Individuals who completed the Measuring Product Success workshop will have the knowledge and skills required to determine product metrics that track success, a toolkit to establish a product’s high-level and proxy metrics, and the skills to evaluate and measure progress.
3ad75153-8891-4cdf-ac9e-536fd7cc5364.name: Measuring Product Success

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 3-hour workshop led by Gibson Biddle, former VP of Product at Netflix
Completed the Section Measuring Product Success Workshop project

a9b47e15-bb39-4d74-bee2-9fdb3ad01440.description: Individuals who complete Strategic Planning have the skills to build and implement a two-page strategic plan that connects OKRs to their organization’s most important priorities. They are also able to lead others on their team through the strategic planning process and monitor the implementation of those plans.
a9b47e15-bb39-4d74-bee2-9fdb3ad01440.name: Strategic Planning

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Strategic Planning project by building an actionable two-part plan

76dadf1a-26fe-463e-97e2-b16f9719fe44.description: Individuals who completed the Building a Business Case workshop have the ability to construct a compelling, comprehensive business case that addresses a key problem or opportunity in their organization. They can create a presentation or document that includes the goal and hypothesis of their business case, a detailed solution, the high-level financials, and how to mitigate risks and dependencies.
76dadf1a-26fe-463e-97e2-b16f9719fe44.name: Building a Business Case

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 2.5-hour workshop led by Nicole Alexander, Global Head of Marketing at Meta
Learned a four-part framework for building a business case and applied it in a small-group case study
Completed the Section Building a Business Case Workshop project

ef286a24-73c4-4885-a286-110e5e7c2ce2.description: Individuals who completed the Analyzing Data for Insights workshop will have the knowledge and tools to perform basic analyses to reveal insights. They will have learned the five-step Inquiry to Insight framework, starting with identifying a question and relevant dataset and culminating in communicating analyses in a clear and curated way.
ef286a24-73c4-4885-a286-110e5e7c2ce2.name: Analyzing Data for Insights

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 2-hour workshop led by Sarah Norman, Data Leader at Tik Tok
Completed the Section Analyzing Data for Insights Workshop project

296c02df-1bbb-4f14-964b-7d47e3d410ea.description: Individuals who completed the How to Build a Product Strategy Workshop will have the foundational tools to structure a product strategy that delights customers in hard-to-copy, margin-enhancing ways. They will understand the power and mechanics behind four frameworks to build and prioritize hypotheses, design initiatives with key metrics, and build a roadmap.
296c02df-1bbb-4f14-964b-7d47e3d410ea.name: How to Build a Product Strategy

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 3-hour workshop led by Gibson Biddle, including learning the frameworks and applying them in a small-group case study

Completed the Section How to Build a Product Strategy Workshop project: Create an MVP product strategy for your company using the following frameworks: DHM - Delight Customers in Hard-to-Copy, Margin-Enhancing Ways, GEM - Growth, Engagement, Monetization, SMT - Strategy, Metrics, Tactics, and Roadmap

0a14f47d-4d8a-4b09-bfc0-ca180143403a.description: Individuals who complete Compelling Presentations have the skills to create and deliver a concise, captivating, and informative presentation. They are able to identify the characteristics of a great presentation, build an effective deck, and use delivery techniques to land with their audience.
0a14f47d-4d8a-4b09-bfc0-ca180143403a.name: Compelling Presentations

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Compelling Presentations project and all course materials in the Section Compelling Presentations course

cddc33aa-7537-4f73-9631-e2373d938017.description: Individuals who completed the Investor Mindset will have a foundational knowledge for how to identify the major growth drivers of their business. Using the Risk/Reward framework, they can work through the three steps of confidence-building for growth initiatives: developing a growth thesis, identifying key drivers, and determining key metrics.
cddc33aa-7537-4f73-9631-e2373d938017.name: Investor Mindset

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 1.5-hour workshop led by Goodwater Capital’s Eric Kim, learning the Risk/Reward framework
Completed the Section Business Drivers for Growth Workshop project: Applying the Risk/Reward framework in a small-group case study

728fbd9a-6f04-4a75-95a2-ba8b1311fa50.description: Individuals who complete the Digital Strategist Certificate will have a strong understanding of the digital landscape and the ability to plot a digital transformation roadmap for their organization. They will understand the most successful business models in the tech-driven economy, and have a working knowledge of both digital product strategy and digital marketing strategy.
728fbd9a-6f04-4a75-95a2-ba8b1311fa50.name: Digital Strategist Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Completed all course materials for the Business Strategy and Platform Strategy sprints, as well as course materials for three elective courses in digital product strategy and digital marketing strategy
Submitted projects for each completed course

cc6c8fa0-55f9-4a68-beb1-4ae170f9faeb.description: Individuals who complete Customer Retention Strategy have the skills to win and keep customers at every stage of the customer journey. They are able to understand how their role specifically relates to retention, identify why customers churn, and set strategies for winning customers back.
cc6c8fa0-55f9-4a68-beb1-4ae170f9faeb.name: Customer Retention Strategy

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Customer Retention Strategy project. Applied the customer retention strategy framework in a small group case study.
Completed all course materials in the Section Customer Retention Strategy course.

5c248786-10fa-4a85-be0e-4f0dea444ae0.description: Individuals who complete Kickstart Your Digital Transformation have the skills to set a digital strategy to stay competitive in a rapidly changing market. They are able implement a 5-step framework of 1. auditing customer friction points, 2. pinpointing digital opportunities, 3. assigning objectives, 4. anticipating problems, and 5. setting key results to create an OKR-based plan to kickstart their digital transformation. They understand how to approach initiatives with a digital mindset.
5c248786-10fa-4a85-be0e-4f0dea444ae0.name: Kickstart Your Digital Transformation

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Digital Transformation project. Applied the digital transformation framework in a small group case study.
Completed all course materials in the Section Kickstart Your Digital Transformation course.

d646920b-7f8c-4a83-a28a-11ee73ff8736.description: Individuals who completed the Driving Product Led Growth workshop will have the knowledge and tools required to instill a product-led growth mindset throughout their organization, a toolkit of tactics to drive growth and deliver value to customers faster, and the ability to build viral loops into their products to encourage repeat use.
d646920b-7f8c-4a83-a28a-11ee73ff8736.name: Driving Product Led Growth

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 2-hour workshop led by Wes Bush, author of Product-Led Growth.
Learned the Straight-Line Onboarding framework and applied it in a small-group case study.

Completed the Section Driving Product Led Growth Workshop project: identify and prioritize the mission-critical steps of their companies’ product onboarding experiences; propose go-forward recommendations to enhance their firm’s straight-line onboarding process; and become more product-led.

a66246a3-de1c-4f9f-9b45-74892a67f2f4.description: Individuals who completed the Influencing Consumer Behavior workshop have the understanding of three ethnographic research techniques to understand their customers, and know how to use that information to influence their behavior. They can utilize platforms such as Twitter or Reddit to conduct a rapid 5-step netnography and gain insight into how their customers see and make meaning of their world.
a66246a3-de1c-4f9f-9b45-74892a67f2f4.name: Influencing Consumer Behavior

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 3-hour workshop led by Marcus Collins, professor at University of Michigan Ross
Learned the 5-step netnography framework and applied it in a small-group case study
Completed the Section Influencing Consumer Behavior Workshop project

ef2c351f-a8e8-42a6-9b63-a4c67a947cc6.description: Individuals who complete the Product Leadership course have the skills to lead product teams to success. They create a working environment where their team can thrive, make smart decisions, and build transformative products.
ef2c351f-a8e8-42a6-9b63-a4c67a947cc6.name: Product Leadership

badge_template_activities.title: Completed all course materials in the Section Product Leadership course
Completed the Product Leadership project. Applied the product leadership framework to their company

09af85d4-4aa5-4099-b953-7243076ccb13.description: Individuals who complete Building Product Roadmaps have the skills to build a product roadmap that reflects and operationalizes their product strategy. They are able to prioritize projects based on impact and effort, and can communicate their decisions to the larger organization by using their roadmap as a tool to drive buy-in.
09af85d4-4aa5-4099-b953-7243076ccb13.name: Building Product Roadmaps

badge_template_activities.title: Completed all course materials in the Section Building Product Roadmaps course
Completed the Building Product Roadmaps project. Applied the product roadmap framework in a small group case study

3412423a-b297-4752-81b1-c23123bea52d.description: Individuals who complete Demonstrating Financial Impact have the skills to build a business case that is supported by financial data. They are able to identify the KPIs most relevant to their business case, and use them to build a convincing financial case for their initiative.
3412423a-b297-4752-81b1-c23123bea52d.name: Demonstrating Financial Impact

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Demonstrating Financial Impact project. Applied key financial terms in a small group case study. Completed all course materials in the Section4 Demonstrating Financial Impact course.

dd87f0a1-fdc3-43fe-9849-5560a6ad3482.description: Individuals who completed the How to Win Your Best-Fit Customers workshop will understand how to identify what makes a great customer, and learn how to target and acquire those higher-value customers. They will have a basis for how to use customer lifetime value (CLV) to drive strategic growth, and reflect on effective resource allocation across the customer lifecycle.
dd87f0a1-fdc3-43fe-9849-5560a6ad3482.name: How to Win Your Best-Fit Customers

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 3-hour workshop led by Neil Hoyne, Chief Measurement Strategist at Google
Completed the Section reflection-question based exercises about effectively allocating resources to increase customer lifetime value

67d56a6e-1bbf-4b64-8fe1-53259a1113d0.description: Individuals who complete the Strategic Leader Certificate will have mastered the skills necessary to lead high-performing teams and influence strategy within an organization. They will have a strong understanding of setting business strategy, managing for success, wielding cross-functional influence, and communicating their leadership vision.
67d56a6e-1bbf-4b64-8fe1-53259a1113d0.name: Strategic Leader Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Completed all course materials for five of the following courses: Customer-Centered Innovation, Investor Mindset, Business Strategy, Complete Manager, Structuring Teams for Impact, Storytelling with Data, and Storytelling for Influence
Submitted projects for each completed course

46e908e0-ef75-4868-a39e-cef94864d968.description: Individuals who complete the Product Strategist Certificate will have strong foundational knowledge across the product discipline, enabling them to lead product teams to success. They will understand the key elements of product strategy, including product experimentation and launch, product positioning, and product-led growth.
46e908e0-ef75-4868-a39e-cef94864d968.name: Product Strategist Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Completed all course materials for the How to Build a Product Strategy and Measuring Product Success workshops, as well as course materials for three elective courses in product positioning, product principles, platform strategy, product engagement, product experimentation, and product leadership
Submitted projects for each completed course

4532820a-3b2e-4102-afe6-2f738ce711b1.description: Individuals who complete Recession Proofing Your Business have the skills to identify, evaluate and protect their core business during a recession. They are able to understand their core customer, know how the recession will affect that customer's ability to spend, and make crucial decisions to protect the business during this time.
4532820a-3b2e-4102-afe6-2f738ce711b1.name: Recession Proofing your Business

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the Recession Proofing Your Business project. Applied the recession proofing in a small group case study.
Completed all course materials in the Section Recession Proofing Your Business course.

a3886234-2cdd-406b-a473-098b1e0b6ce4.description: Individuals who completed the Marketing Acquisition Strategy workshop will have the knowledge and tools to use paid channels intentionally based on their company’s situation. They choose the right paid growth channels for their business and know how to measure the impact of creatives to scale the right ones.
a3886234-2cdd-406b-a473-098b1e0b6ce4.name: Marketing Acquisition Strategy

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 3-hour workshop led by Holly Chen, former head of digital marketing, Slack
Completed the Section Marketing Acquisition Strategy Workshop project

59dc09fd-4f2c-4fca-90fd-f05e801eb4bc.description: Individuals who complete Structuring Teams for Impact have the skills to create an organizational chart that helps meet strategic priorities. They are able to identify the key roles and responsibilities needed on their team, create design principles that align with business needs, and communicate those principles through a structured narrative.
59dc09fd-4f2c-4fca-90fd-f05e801eb4bc.name: Structuring Teams for Impact

badge_template_activities.title: Completed all course materials in the Section Structuring Teams for Impact course
Completed the Structuring Teams for Impact project and applied the organizational chart framework in a small group case study

2870c221-8df5-4e86-af93-112264e3105d.description: Individuals who complete the Business Core Certificate will have mastered the business skills essential to being a high performer in any industry. They will have a strong foundational knowledge of problem-solving and building a business case, as well as elective knowledge in finance, presentation and communication, data, and/or execution.
2870c221-8df5-4e86-af93-112264e3105d.name: Business Core Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Completed all course materials for the Problem Solving and Building a Business Case workshops, as well as course materials for three elective courses in finance, data analysis, presentation, or productivity
Submitted projects for each completed course

3731cb85-66d1-4e9c-9ff8-f577402798ce.description: Individuals who completed the Developing Buyer Personas workshop will have the knowledge and tools to develop an actionable buyer persona. They will source data and work through the seven steps of the buyer persona framework to determine where in their buyer persona’s decision-making process they will focus marketing efforts.
3731cb85-66d1-4e9c-9ff8-f577402798ce.name: Developing Buyer Personas

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 2-hour workshop led by Radhika Duggal, CMO of Snapcommerce
Completed the Section Developing Buyer Personas Workshop project

a32df8c6-710f-4b03-bb7b-aef58005d33a.description: Individuals who completed the How to Write a Creative Brief workshop will have the knowledge and tools to set up the ideal conditions for agencies and internal stakeholders to deliver their best effort. They understand the six principles of brief writing and know how to work through the four parts of a great creative brief: objective, context, constraints, and ways of working.
a32df8c6-710f-4b03-bb7b-aef58005d33a.name: How to Write a Creative Brief

badge_template_activities.title: Attended the 1.5-hour workshop led by Eric Ng, Executive Creative Director at DesignStudio
Completed the Section Creative Brief Workshop project

d5b14514-28e2-4943-9319-5a8900f92314.description: Individuals who complete the Marketing Strategist Certificate will have strong foundational knowledge across the marketing mix, enabling them to lead marketing teams to success. They will understand the key elements of marketing strategy, including brand strategy and positioning, growth marketing, content marketing, and lifecycle marketing.
d5b14514-28e2-4943-9319-5a8900f92314.name: Marketing Strategist Certificate

badge_template_activities.title: Completed all course materials for five of the following courses: Brand Strategy, Product Positioning, Growth Marketing, Influencing Consumer Behavior, Viral Growth, and How to Win Your Best-Fit Customers
Submitted projects for each completed course
